1.name: Bloody Cultist
1.description: A cultist in dark red robes stained in blood holding a wicked looking dagger.

2.name: Wailing Ghoul
2.description: A hunched figure surrounded by cat food and glue, he wails for the day man that could not manage to protect this little boys soul.

3.name: Crazed Cultist
3.description: A cultist in dark red robes with a mad look in his eyes holding a wicked looking dagger.
